thread.title: Excellent Stay!
thread.title_full: Excellent Stay! - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Central Park, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Vida-amorosa
title: Excellent Stay!
text:
Surprisingly a wonderful stay. The room I had was small and very clean and modern with an unexpected breathtaking view. The lounge for breakfast was beyond my expectations - very spacious and clean with decent choices (meats/eggs/pastries/fruit/yogurts). I frequent NYC a lot and will make this my go to hotel.
Room Tip: high floor, corner room See more room tips
